def main():

    """

    >>> item1 = MenuItem(DeleteFileCommand())



    >>> item2 = MenuItem(HideFileCommand())



    # create a file named `test-file` to work with

    >>> test_file_name = 'test-file'



    # deleting `test-file`

    >>> item1.on_do_press(test_file_name)

    deleting test-file



    # restoring `test-file`

    >>> item1.on_undo_press()

    restoring test-file



    # hiding `test-file`

    >>> item2.on_do_press(test_file_name)

    hiding test-file



    # un-hiding `test-file`

    >>> item2.on_undo_press()

    un-hiding test-file

    """
